text: Antero Vanhanen (1 April 1935 - 30 December 1986) was a Finnish wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman light heavyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Finnish male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Finland Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Saint Petersburg
title: Antero Vanhanen
